files.patch: @@ -175,2 +175,6 @@ - // returns true if extended attributes enabled on file system where given - // file resides, returns false if disabled or unable to determine. + /** + * Checks whether extended attributes are enabled on the file system where the given file resides. + * + * @param path A path pointing to an existing node, such as the file system's root + * @return true if enabled, false if disabled or unable to determine + */

@@ -48,3 +48,0 @@
-    // returns the maximum supported length of xattr names (in bytes, including namespace)
-    protected abstract int maxNameLength();
-
@@ -94,0 +91,5 @@
+    /**
+     * @return the maximum supported length of xattr names (in bytes, including namespace)
+     */
+    protected abstract int maxNameLength();
